item.description:
The Boston By Foot annual Halloween Tour celebration.

Walk the dark side on All Hallows' Eve and there's no better place to do it than on a guided tour of Beacon Hill. Hear stories of ghosts, murders and mayhem that haunt this quiet neighborhood. Walk among elaborate ghostly decorations and the tons of people who come to Beacon Hill every year to celebrate.

If you have never been to Beacon Hill on Halloween, this is one of those must-see events in Boston.

This ninety-minute tour will highlight Beacon Hill's rich heritage of mystery and suspense. See the home of the murdered George Parkman and learn what happened to his dismembered body. You'll also find out about haunted courthouses, murdered lovers, hanged witches, stranglers, creative uses of human skin, and more death.

Tickets for the tour are $15 ($5 for card-carrying Boston By Foot members) and can be purchased directly from your guides.

Costumes optional.
item.name: Beacon Hill With A BOO! Halloween Celebration
